name: Separated (ACMI.ScreenIt)
description:
2019 Senior (Yr 9 - 12) Videogame Winner

You are a casual spelunker exploring a new cave system that has been discovered when all the sudden you slipped and fell into a weird and mysterious part of the cave that was not within the cave survey. It all seemed man-built, but in an attempt to escape, you listen to the clues while curiously going about the interesting cave. Can you escape the mysterious cave?

Check out the Australian Centre for the Moving Image's Screen It competition  here.
